content: I'm at All Things Open in Raleigh right now and Josh Aas from the ISRG is giving a great talk about how they're funding projects to rewrite their most important code in Rust
"if anyone knows how to convince nginx to rewrite things in Rust, please let me know"
"any version of C++ that's memory safe would be so much work to switch to it has no major advantage over Rust"
Josh is great! Glad to hear he's talking publicaly about this stuff!
@Alex Gaynor he said you and Miguel Ojeda deserve most of the credit for pushing forward Rust for Linux :) thanks for working on it!
